attributes.action: Increasing mental health staff in schools across the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Staff more mental health/youth professionals to ensure that children in secondary schools are not affected by the stress they face from home and school pressure.
attributes.background: Discuss and fund the increase of mental health and pastoral teams within secondary schools.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Provide urgent ring-fenced funding for counsellors in every school in England
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/716942
